articles.title: More than 170m Americans under heat alerts as heatwave expands - The Guardian US

articles.content: Over 170 million Americans are under heat alerts this week, according to the National Weather Service, as a heat wave that has affected the southern US for weeks has expanded into parts of the Great … [+7898 chars]

articles.description: The Next supercontinent is in the making. Today, there are seven continents. Some 200 million years from now there will be just one. Geophysicist Ross Mitche...
